duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through proactive business-to-business sales efforts.
Prioritize and pursue opportunities, managing multiple touch points for maximum outcomes.
Engage in face-to-face networking and product promotion to build out a portfolio rapidly.
Maintain client relationships to drive future revenue growth and lead client acquisition.
Communicate effectively to bring concepts to life and maintain a top position in sales performance.
Undergo training in publishing and receive organizational support for high-performance sales.
Manage territories and apply for the position with the required high-performance qualities.
